jurisdiction.translation[0].definitions[: the right to use an official power to make legal decisions, or the area where this right exists
The committee has jurisdiction over all tax measures.
jurisdiction.translation[1].definitions[: the official right and power to make decisions about something
This matter is outside my jurisdiction.
The bankruptcy court now has jurisdiction over the companyâ€™s assets.
The firm has now become a joint stock company under the jurisdiction of the Russian republic.
This matter is now within the jurisdiction of the US courts.
